de.rwth.i2.attestor.main

Interface AnalysisTaskBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAnalysisTaskBuilder, GeneralAnalysisTaskBuilder, IndexedAnalysisTaskBuilder

    public interface AnalysisTaskBuilder
    A builder class to comfortably create and customize a program analysis task from files or already created objects.
    Author:
    Christoph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AnalysisTask build()
      Checks validity of the specified analysis task.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder loadInput(String filename)
      Load the initial state of the program analysis from a file.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder loadProgram(String classpath, String filename, String entryPoint)
      Load a program together with the initial method to analyze from a file.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setAbortStrategy(AbortStrategy abortStrategy)
      Sets the strategy that determines when the analysis should be aborted.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setCanonicalizationStrategy(CanonicalizationStrategy canonicalizationStrategy)
      Sets the strategy that determines how states are abstracted.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setInclusionStrategy(InclusionStrategy inclusionStrategy)
      Sets the strategy that determines how to discharge whether a state subsumes another one.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setInput(HeapConfiguration heapConfiguration)
      Determines the initial state of the program analysis.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setMaterializationStrategy(MaterializationStrategy materializationStrategy)
      Sets the strategy that determines how to materialize states.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setProgram(Program program)
      Determines the program that should be analyzed by the analysis.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setScopeDepth(int depth)
      Sets the initial scope depth of the analysis.
      AnalysisTaskBuilder setStateLabelingStrategy(StateLabelingStrategy stateLabelingStrategy)
      Sets the strategy that determines how atomic propositions are assigned to states.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        AnalysisTask build()
        Checks validity of the specified analysis task. If the specification is sufficient to execute the task, it creates the task. This builder is not usable afterwards anymore.
        Returns:
        The AnalysisTask derived from the specification contained in the builder.

      • loadInput

        AnalysisTaskBuilder loadInput(String filename)
                       throws FileNotFoundException
        Load the initial state of the program analysis from a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file containing the initial state.
        Returns:
        The builder.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the provided filename could not be found.

      • setInput

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setInput(HeapConfiguration heapConfiguration)
        Determines the initial state of the program analysis.
        Parameters:
        heapConfiguration - The initial state.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • loadProgram

        AnalysisTaskBuilder loadProgram(String classpath,
                                String filename,
                                String entryPoint)
        Load a program together with the initial method to analyze from a file.
        Parameters:
        classpath - The classpath leading to the file.
        filename - The name of the source code file.
        entryPoint - The name of the method from which the analysis should be started.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • setProgram

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setProgram(Program program)
        Determines the program that should be analyzed by the analysis.
        Parameters:
        program - The program to analyze.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • setScopeDepth

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setScopeDepth(int depth)
        Sets the initial scope depth of the analysis.
        Parameters:
        depth - The scope depth (=> 0).
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • setAbortStrategy

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setAbortStrategy(AbortStrategy abortStrategy)
        Sets the strategy that determines when the analysis should be aborted.
        Parameters:
        abortStrategy - The strategy.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • setMaterializationStrategy

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setMaterializationStrategy(MaterializationStrategy materializationStrategy)
        Sets the strategy that determines how to materialize states.
        Parameters:
        materializationStrategy - The strategy.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • setCanonicalizationStrategy

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setCanonicalizationStrategy(CanonicalizationStrategy canonicalizationStrategy)
        Sets the strategy that determines how states are abstracted.
        Parameters:
        canonicalizationStrategy - The strategy.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • setInclusionStrategy

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setInclusionStrategy(InclusionStrategy inclusionStrategy)
        Sets the strategy that determines how to discharge whether a state subsumes another one.
        Parameters:
        inclusionStrategy - The strategy.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • setStateLabelingStrategy

        AnalysisTaskBuilder setStateLabelingStrategy(StateLabelingStrategy stateLabelingStrategy)
        Sets the strategy that determines how atomic propositions are assigned to states.
        Parameters:
        stateLabelingStrategy - The strategy.
        Returns:
        The builder.
